general.title: Something went wrong
general.message: An error has occurred! We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to resolve the issue.

server.title: Server Error
server.message: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please try again later.

network.title: Network Error
network.message: Network error. Please check your connection.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You are not authorized to perform this action.

invalid_credentials.title: Invalid Credentials
invalid_credentials.message: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

login_locked.title: Your account has been locked temporarily
login_locked.message: You have made too many login requests and will be unlocked after 60 seconds.
